name: MAGIC ITEM (6): SAILOR'S COMFORT
description:
Inspired artisans of the coasts of ZAMADAR made these "lover's bracelets" 19,000 years ago during the Hyborian age before the rise of the Final Atlantean kingdoms.


It was likely given by a temple maiden to her favorite young man before his multi-year sea voyage to hunt for the zygophyseter on the multi masted galleys of that fabled harbor city. 

Tradition held that the love-murmurs of the young lady could be heard through the 'ear-shaped' shell slices, and would keep the young man's heart faithful and warm on the long and dangerous voyage.

This digital "token" confers upon you
a portion of the aesthetic and para-natural
power of this radiant meta-object.

Think on the maker of this physical item
and send them your gratitude
through the centuries - for the
privilege of holding it's
meta-verse avatar.

I took this photo 'akashikally' and 
was blessed by this object and 
the sincere expression of it's maker.

I truly hope my photo gives a portion
of that warmth and comfort to you.

HPL
